          <title>
            <string language="fr">Ordures biodégradables et non-biodégradables</string>
            <string language="en">Biodegradable and non-biodegradable waste</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biodegradierbare und nicht-biodegradierbare 
Vergeudung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Desperdício biodegradable e 
non-non-biodegradable</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Spreco biodegradabile e non-biodegradabile</string>

            <string language="x-mt-es">Basura biodegradable y no-biodegradable</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette série d'illustrations montre les types de détritus qui se décomposent et ceux qui ne se décomposent pas.</string>
            <string language="en">This series of illustrations shows the types of litter that decay and do not decay.</string>
          </description>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Reihe Abbildungen zeigt die Typen der

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta série das ilustrações mostra os tipos de

          </description>
